extDescription.message: Instantly copy the current tab's URL to clipboard with Ctrl+Shift+C

welcomeTitle.message: Thanks for installing Fast Copy URL!

welcomeSubtitle.message: Instantly copy the URL of any tab with a simple keyboard shortcut. Fast, lightweight, and hassle-free.

welcomeStep1Desc.message: Visit any website or page in Chrome as you normally would.

welcomeStep2Desc.message: Use Ctrl + Shift + C to copy the URL.

welcomeStep3Desc.message: The URL is now in your clipboard. Paste it anywhere you like.
